mapper.select: SELECT C.QA_ID, C.QESTN_SJ, C.QESTN_CN, C.WRITNG_PASSWORD, C.AREA_NO, C.MIDDLE_TELNO, C.END_TELNO, C.EMAIL_ADRES, C.EMAIL_ANSWER_AT, C.WRTER_NM, C.WRITNG_DE, C.ANSWER_CN, C.ANSWER_DE, C.RDCNT, C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE, D.CODE_NM QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM, A.USER_NM, A.OFFM_TELNO, A.EMAIL_ADRES AEMAIL_ADRES, B.ORGNZT_NM , TO_CHAR(C.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , C.FRST_REGISTER_ID, TO_CHAR(C.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'YYYY-MM-DD') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQAINFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE D ON D.CODE_ID ='COM028' AND C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNEMPLYRINFO A ON A.ESNTL_ID= C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTNORGNZTINFO B ON A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID WHERE QA_ID=#{qaId}

SELECT QA_ID, QESTN_SJ, QESTN_CN, WRITNG_PASSWORD, AREA_NO, MIDDLE_TELNO, END_TELNO, EMAIL_ADRES, EMAIL_ANSWER_AT, WRTER_NM, WRITNG_DE, ANSWER_CN, ANSWER_DE, RDCNT, QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE, QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ,LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,QNA.* FROM ( SELECT QA_ID, QESTN_SJ, QESTN_CN, WRITNG_PASSWORD, AREA_NO, MIDDLE_TELNO, END_TELNO, EMAIL_ADRES, EMAIL_ANSWER_AT, WRTER_NM, WRITNG_DE, ANSWER_CN, ANSWER_DE, RDCNT, QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE, B.CODE_NM QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE_NM, A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQAINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN LETTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID ='COM028' AND A.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND WRTER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QESTN_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY QA_ID DESC ) QNA ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{recordCountPerPage} and RNUM > #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM LETTNQAINFO WHERE 1=1
AND WRTER_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND QESTN_SJ LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
